actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to treatment of certain bargain sales of real property.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require taking into account, for purposes of determining gain, the entire adjusted basis of property sold to a tax-exempt charitable organization as conservation property. Provides for determining the fair market value of restrictions on such property for purposes of determining the allowable deduction.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to treatment of certain bargain sales of real property.
